title: YouTube rolls out two new features to make it easier to find credible health information
content:
In a bid to make it easier for users to find credible health information, YouTube is rolling out two new features for health-related searches: health source information panels and health content shelves. The health source information panel will show up on videos from authoritative sources. This serves as an indicator that the information shared in

The post YouTube rolls out two new features to make it easier to find credible health information appeared first on xda-developers.
description: YouTube is rolling out two new features for health-related searches: health source information panels and health content shelves.
